text: The Monumental Bullring of Lourenço Marques also known as the Maputo Bullring, in Maputo is one of 8 bullrings in Africa, along with Tangier, Luanda, Melilla, Uchda, Villa Sanjurjo and Oran. Ricardo Chibanga, the first black African bullfighter, saw fights here as a child.[https://observador.pt/2019/04/16/ricardo-chibanga-sempre-senti-medo- nao-ha-um-unico-toureiro-que-nao-sinta-medo/ Ricardo Chibanga: “Sempre senti medo. Não há um único toureiro que não sinta medo” observador.pt In 1968 a boxing match was held between Willie Ludick and Curtis Cokes. In 1969, the Governor-General of Mozambique Baltasar Rebelo de Sousa went to see a bullfight in the bullring.Tourada em Lourenço Marques RTP ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Mozambique Category:Bullrings in Mozambique Category:Portuguese Colonial architecture in Mozambique
title: Praça de Touros Monumental de Lourenço Marques
